item.title: How to Setup Peercoin on Raspberry Pi for Headless Minting
item.author: bart@mikasoftware.com (Mika Software Corporation)
item.description: Would you believe you can participate in cryptocurrency production using a simple Raspberry Pi computer? No need for powerful ASIC miners! Peercoin is an interesting altcoin that has minting capability built-in, and minting is the ability to create new coins from the ones you already have. In this tutorial, you’ll learn how to set up a dedicated Raspberry Pi computer to mint the Peercoins in your wallet.
